Sources to get a github page with jekyll

Monday, June 10, 2019

In order to get a github page, I found out to great resources

  • The first one will guide you through the first steps in order to set up a working hello world page.

  • Once you have set up your repository, I recommend using themes that you can easily modify to save some time, otherwise you can build your own website with jekyll.
